Verses: 1 naangal Iththaaliyaa Dhesaththukkuk Kappal Erip Pogumpadi Theermaanikkappattabodhu, Pavulaiyum Kaavalil Vaikkappattirundha Verusilaraiyum Agusthu Pattaalaththaich Serndha Yooliyu Ennumperkonda Nootrukku Adhibadhiyinidaththil Oppuviththaargal.

2 adhiramiththiyam Oorkkappalil Naangal Eri, Aasiyaa Naattuk Karaipidiththodavendumendru Ninaiththup Purappattom. Makkedhoniyaa Dhesaththuth Thesalonikke Pattanaththaanaagiya Arisdharkku Engaludanekooda Irundhaan.
3 marunaal Seedhon Thuraipidiththom. Yooliyu Pavulaip Patchamaai Nadappiththu, Avan Than Sinegidharidaththile Poip Paraamarippadaiyumpadikku Uththaravu Koduththaan.
4 avvidamvittu Naangal Purappattu, Edhirkaatraayirundhapadiyinaal, Seeppurutheevin Odhukkile Odinom.
5 pinbu Silisiyaa Pambiliyaa Naadugalin Kadalvazhiyaai Odi, Leesiyaa Naattu Meeraappattanaththil Serndhom.
6 iththaaliyaavukkup Pogira Aleksandhiriyaa Pattanaththuk Kappalai Nootrukku Adhibadhi Ange Kandu, Engalai Adhil Etrinaan.
7 kaatru Engalaith Thaduththapadiyinaale, Naangal Aneganaal Medhuvaaich Sendru, Varuththaththode Kineedhupattanaththirku Edhire Vandhu, Salmone Oorukku Edhiraaik Gireththaatheevin Odhukkil Odinom.
8 adhai Varuththaththode Kadandhu, Nalla Thuraimugam Ennappatta Oru Idaththirku Vandhom; Laseyappattanam Adharkuch Sameebamaayirundhadhu.
9 vegukaalam Sendru, Ubavaasanaalum Kazhindhuponapadiyinaale, Inik Kappalyaaththirai Seygiradhu Mosaththirku Edhuvaayirukkumendru, Pavul Avargalai Nokki:

10 manushare, Indha Yaaththiraiyinaale Sarakkukkum Kappalukkum Maaththiramalla, Nammudaiya Jeevanukkum Varuththamum Migundha Sedhamum Undaayirukkumendru Kaangiren Endru Solli, Avargalai Echchariththaan.
11 nootrukku Adhibadhi Pavulinaal Sollappattavaigalaip Paarkkilum Maalumiyaiyum Kappal Ejamaanaiyum Adhigamaai Nambinaan.

12 andhath Thuraimugam Mazhaikaalaththile Thanguvadharku Vasadhiyaayiraadhapadiyinaal, Avvidaththai Vittuth Thenmerkaiyum Vadamerkaiyum Nokkiyirukkum Kireththaatheevilulla Thuraimugamaagiya Peniks Ennum Idaththil Serakkoodumaanaal Serndhu, Mazhaikaalaththil Thangumpadi Anegamper Aalosanai Sonnaargal.
13 thendral Medhuvaayadiththapadiyaal, Thaangal Korinadhu Kaikoodivandhadhendru Enni, Avvidamvittup Peyarndhu Kireththaatheevukku Arugaaga Odinaargal.
14 konjaneraththukkulle Yoorokkilidhon Ennung Kadunkaatru Adhil Modhitru.
15 kappal Adhil Agappattukkondu, Kaatrukku Edhirththuppogakkoodaadhapadiyinaal Kaatrin Pokkile Kondupogappattom.
16 appadik Kilavudhaa Ennappatta Oru Sinna Theevin Odhukkile Odugaiyil Vegu Varuththaththode Padavai Vasappaduththinom.
17 adhai Avargal Thookkiyeduththa Pinbu, Pala Ubaayangal Seydhu, Kappalaich Sutrik Katti, Sorimanalile Vizhuvomendru Bayandhu, Paaigalai Irakki, Ivvidhamaaik Kondupogappattaargal.
18 melum Perunkaatru Mazhaiyil Naangal Migavum Adipattapadiyinaal, Marunaalil Sila Sarakkugalaik Kadalil Erindhaargal.
19 moondraam Naalile Kappalin Thalavaadangalai Engal Kaigalinaale Eduththu Erindhom.
20 aneganaalaaich Sooriyanaavadhu Natchaththirangalaavadhu Kaanappadaamal, Migundha Perungaatrumazhaiyum Adiththukkondirundhapadiyinaal, Ini Thappippizhaippomennum Nambikkai Muzhumaiyum Atruppoyitru.

21 aneganaal Avargal Pojanampannaamal Irundhabodhu, Pavul Avargal Naduvile Nindru: Manushare, Indha Varuththamum Sedhamum Vaaraadhapadikku En Sollaikkettu, Kireththaatheevai Vittuppurappadaamal Irukkavendiyadhaayirundhadhu.
22 aagilum, Thidamanadhaayirungalendru Ippozhudhu Ungalukkuth Thairiyansollugiren. Kapparsedhameyallaamal Ungalil Oruvanukkum Piraanasedham Varaadhu.
23 enendraal, Ennai Aatkondavarum Naan Sevikkiravarumaana Dhevanudaiya Thoodhanaanavan Indha Raaththiriyile Ennidaththil Vandhunindru:
24 pavule, Bayappadaadhe, Nee Raayanukku Munbaaga Nirkavendum. Idho, Unnudanekooda Yaaththiraipannugira Yaavaraiyum Dhevan Unakkuth Dhayavupanninaar Endraan.
25 aanapadiyinaal Manushare, Thidamanadhaayirungal. Enakkuch Sollappattapiragaaramaagave Nadakkum Endru Dhevanidaththil Nambikkaiyaayirukkiren.
26 aayinum Naam Oru Theevile Vizhavendiyadhaayirukkum Endraan.
27 padhinaalaam Raaththiriyaanabodhu, Naangal Aadhiriyaak Kadalile Alaivupattu Odugaiyil, Nadujaamaththile Kappalaatkalukku Oru Karai Kittivarugiradhaagath Thondritru.
28 udane Avargal Vizhudhuvittu Irubadhu Paagamendru Kandaargal; Satrappuram Ponapozhudhu, Marupadiyum Vizhudhuvittup Padhinaindhu Paagamendru Kandaargal.
29 paaraiyidangalil Vizhuvomendru Bayandhu, Pinnaniyaththilirundhu Naalu Nangoorangalaippottu, Pozhudhu Eppodhu Vidiyumo Endrirundhaargal.
30 appozhudhu Kappalaatkal Kappalai Vittodippoga Vagaithedi, Munnaniyaththilirundhu Nangoorangalaip Podappogira Paavanaiyaaip Padavaik Kadalilirakkugaiyil,
31 pavul Nootrukku Adhibadhiyaiyum Sevagaraiyum Nokki: Ivargal Kappaliliraavittaal Neengal Thappip Pizhaikkamaatteergal Endraan.
32 appozhudhu, Porchsevagar Padavin Kayirugalai Aruththu, Adhaith Thaazhavizhavittaargal.
33 pozhudhu Vidigaiyil Ellaarum Pojanampannumpadi Pavul Avargalukkuth Dhairiyansolli: Neengal Indru Padhinaalunaalaai Ondrum Saappidaamal Pattiniyaayirukkireergal.
34 aagaiyaal Pojanampannumpadi Ungalai Vendikkollugiren, Neengal Thappip Pizhaippadharku Adhu Udhaviyaayirukkum; Ungal Thalaiyilirundhu Oru Mayirum Vizhaadhu Endraan.
35 ippadich Solli, Appaththai Eduththu, Ellaarukku Munbaagavum Dhevanai Sthoththiriththu, Adhaip Pittup Pusikkaththodanginaan.
36 appozhudhu Ellaarum Thitdamanappattup Pusiththaargal.
37 kappalil Irunootrezhubaththaaruper Irundhom.
38 thirupthiyaagap Pusiththapinbu Avargal Godhumaiyaik Kadalile Erindhu, Kappalai Lakuvaakkinaargal.
39 pozhudhu Vidindhapinbu, Innaboomiyendru Ariyaadhirundhaargal. Appozhudhu Samamaana Karaiyulla Oru Thuraimugam Avargalukkuth Thenpattadhu; Koodumaanaal Adharkul Kappalaiyotta Yosanaiyaayirundhu,
40 nangoorangalai Aruththuk Kadalile Vittuvittu, Sukkaangaludaiya Kattugalaith Thalaravittu, Perumpaayaik Kaatrumugamaai Viriththu, Karaikku Neraai Odi,
41 irupuramum Kadal Modhiya Oruidaththile Kappalaith Thattavaiththaargal; Munnaniyam Oondri Asaiyaamalirundhadhu, Pinnaniyam Alaigaludaiya Palaththinaal Udaindhupoyitru.
42 appozhudhu Kaavalpannappattavargalil Oruvanum Neendhi Odippogaadhapadikku Avargalaik Kondrupodavendumendru Porchevagar Yosanaiyaayirundhaargal.
43 nootrukku Adhibadhi Pavulaik Kaappaatra Manadhaayirundhu, Avargaludaiya Yosanaiyaith Thaduththu, Neendhaththakkavargal Mundhik Kadalil Vizhundhu Karaiyeravum,
44 matravargalil Silar Palagaigalmelum, Silar Kappal Thundugalmelum Poik Karaiyeravum Kattalaiyittaan; Ivvidhamaai Ellaarum Thappik Karaiserndhaargal.
